#summary Getting Involved in the Project.
#sidebar En

If you've become familiar with the project and feel confident and interested in the participating in it, then read the following guidelines.

=== Joining the phpDays team ===

 * leave your request to join the team as a comment on the [EnAnswers Discussions] page or send it to [http://groups.google.com/group/phpdays-en project support group]
 * in your message state a role you would like to take on _(php developer, web designer, documentation translator, typesetter, !JavaScript developer)_ and include your Gmail address _(your Gmail username is enough)_
 * after some consideration you'll receive an email with our decision about including you in the project _(if you don't get the response in three days, send your request again)_
 * if everything goes well, you'll become a member of the project and will be able to do more than a non-member can _(you'll be able to change the project's code, documentation and tasks)_
 * also you will be added to [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/people/list the project's member list] _(don't forget to add this link to your resume)_

=== General Information about the Site ===

 * [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/downloads/list Downloads] - Download page, where the project's working copies are available, intended for the end user
 * [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/w/list Wiki] - project's documentation
 * [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/issues/list Issues] - list of issues and tasks
 * [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/source/list Source] - information about the project's SVN repository and change log history

=== Uploading the Project's working copy ===

 * download and install an SVN client to work with the project's files
 * download a project's working copy _(for more information see [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/source/checkout Checkout])_
 * if you haven't worked with Subversion before, take your time to learn it

=== Правила внесение изменений _(SVN commit)_ ===

Оформляйте комментарии в следующем виде
 * `Fix #1234: Название исправленной ошибки` - для исправления ошибки номер `1234`. Если ошибки нет в [http://code.google.com/p/phpdays/issues/list Issues] - Вам следует добавить информацию об этой ошибке, а затем произвести `SVN commit`
 * пишите каждую ошибку в отдельной строке. В конце каждой строки ставьте точку

=== Проверяйте сами себя ===

Настройте [http://blogs.sun.com/netbeansphp/entry/recent_improvements_in_phpunit_support PHPUnit] тесты. Это позволит Вам создавать тесты, гарантирующие что новое исправление в коде не поломало что-то другое. Только после этого следует производить `SVN commit`.

=== Пишите качественный код ===

Прочитайте о [RuCodingStyle стиле кодирования], принятом в нашем проекте. Следование единому стилю позволяем всем разработчикам общаться на едином, понятном всем языке.
